snippet: The Guggenheim Foundation and UBS are starting a five-year program to work with artists, curators and educators from South and Southeast Asia, Latin America, the Middle East and North Africa.
abstract: Guggenheim UBS Map Global Art Initiative is a five-year program, financed by Swiss bank UBS, to work with artists, curators and educators from South and Southeast Asia, Latin America, the Middle East and North Africa.
lead_paragraph: The Guggenheim Foundation and UBS are starting a five-year program to work with artists, curators and educators from South and Southeast Asia, Latin America, the Middle East and North Africa.

headline.seo: Guggenheim and UBS Project Plan Cross-Cultural Program
